cause.description:
"Imagine there's no Heaven It's easy if you try No hell below us Above us only sky Imagine all the people Living for today
Imagine there's no countries It isn't hard to do Nothing to kill or die for And no religion too Imagine all the people Living life in peace
You may say that I'm a dreamer But I'm not the only one I hope someday you'll join us And the world will be as one
Imagine no possessions I wonder if you can No need for greed or hunger A brotherhood of man Imagine all the people Sharing all the world
You may say that I'm a dreamer But I'm not the only one I hope someday you'll join us And the world will live as one"
PROCEEDS GO TO AMNESTY INTERNATIONAL
1. "Imagine all of us living in peace. It is too beautiful to just be a dream." - Yoko Ono
cause.mission: Our mission is to enhance the awareness of John Lennon's message contained in his song "Imagine" and to stand together to promote the movement to achieve human rights and peace for all.
cause.name: Imagine
